title: gifting skin for xmas
body:
Hey rite!
So Christmas is coming up, so I went a bought the Tristana dragon trainer skin to gift to my brother. I bought it for my account and not through the gifting thinking that I could gift after I had a bit of go at it to see what it was like.

I don't make a lot of money and I can't really afford to pay for another skin. It's cost me about $35.
 
I was wondering if you guys could refund it so I can re-buy it and send it to my brother.(Tristana main)
I have no refunds left on my account.

Thanks, 
Un4Giving 
Vi

replies.body: hey man add me an tell your brother to ill buy it for him in 4 days :>
Hey{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} , thank you. I got it sorted a friend of mine online helped me out. Thanks a lot for the offer. :)
Send a ticket, but the answer is probably no.
